entry.title: 实用软件或网站导航
entry.content:
以下是自用的实用工具导航，点击链接直达~

graph LR    A[实用工具导航]    A --> B[资源检索]    A --> C[信息处理]    A --> D[AI]    A --> E[科研]        B --> B1[A姐分享]    B --> B2[爱盘搜]    B --> B3[七七云享]    B --> B4[理白嫖]    B --> B5[Zlibrary]    C --> C1["下载再给AI分析：对于小宇宙，电脑打开网页，Ctrl+U打开源码。Ctrl+F搜索m4a，复制相关链接即可下载，方便飞书妙记之类的转写工作"]    C --> C2[豆包浏览器插件，可总结、定位时间戳、生成脑图]    C --> C3[Get笔记:bilibili视频总结+知识库]    C --> C4["小红书无水印下载{再将图片给AI}"]    C --> C5["NotebookLM{youtube视频解析/文件上传解析/知识库}"]    D --> D1[kimi]    D --> D2[Deepseek]    D --> D3[Gemini]    D --> D4[ChatGPT]    D --> D5[Gtihub Copilot]    D --> D6[API供应商]    D --> D7["硅基流动{邀请有赠金}"]    D --> D8["阿里云百炼{有免费额度}"]    D --> D9["ModelScope社区{每天2000次}"]    E --> E1["MATLAB online{数学建模}"]    E --> E2["Doc AI{手写公式识别}"]    E --> E3["AutoDL{算力租用}"]    E --> E4["notion{多维数据库+ai}"]    E --> E5["superbase{数据库}"]    E --> E6["PDF24{在线pdf文件转换工具}"]    E --> E7["Mineru{PDF转markdown}"]    E --> E8["overleaf{在线latex}"]    E --> E9[Google Scholar]    E --> E10[arxiv]    E --> E11[知网]    E --> E12[Trending Papers]        click B1 "https://www.ahhhhfs.com/"    click B2 "https://www.aipanso.com/"    click B3 "hhttps://link3.cc/dinguxiu"    click B4 "https://byepiao.com/"    click B5 "https://tw.z-library.sk/"    click C3 "https://www.biji.com/"    click C4 "https://xiaohongshu.day/zh/"    click C5 "https://notebooklm.google.com/"    click D1 "https://www.kimi.com/"    click D2 "https://chat.deepseek.com/"    click D3 "https://gemini.google.com/app?hl=zh-cn"    click D4 "https://chatgpt.com/"    click D5 "https://github.com/copilot"    click D7 "https://cloud.siliconflow.cn/me/models"    click D8 "https://bailian.console.aliyun.com/?tab=model#/model-market"    click D9 "https://www.modelscope.cn/models"    click E1 "https://matlab.mathworks.com/"    click E2 "https://doc.bitwsd.com/doc_ai/#:~:text=%E5%9C%A8%E7%BA%BF%E5%85%AC%E5%BC%8F%E8%AF%86%E5%88%AB%E5%B7%A5%E5%85%B7,%E6%8D%A2%E4%B8%BA%E5%8F%AF%E7%BC%96%E8%BE%91%E6%96%87%E6%9C%AC%E3%80%82"    click E3 "https://autodl.com/market/list"    click E4 "https://www.notion.com/zh-cn"    click E5 "https://supabase.com/"    click E6 "https://tools.pdf24.org/zh/"    click E7 "https://mineru.net/OpenSourceTools/Extractor"    click E8 "https://www.overleaf.com/"    click E9 "https://scholar.google.com/"    click E10 "https://arxiv.org/"    click E11 "https://www.cnki.net/"
